nfsampler.utils package¶

Submodules¶

nfsampler.utils.Analysis module¶

nfsampler.utils.Analysis.ESS(x)¶

Compute the effective sample size of estimand of interest. Vectorised implementation. x : m_chaines, n_iter, dim

Output: list of ints of length dim: ESS for each dims

nfsampler.utils.Analysis.gelman_rubin(x)¶

Estimate the marginal posterior variance. Vectorised implementation. x : m_chaines, n_iter

nfsampler.utils.PRNG_keys module¶

nfsampler.utils.PRNG_keys.initialize_rng_keys(n_chains, seed=42)¶

Initialize the random number generator keys for the sampler.

Parameters:
  • n_chains (int) – Number of chains for the local sampler.
  • seed (int) – Seed for the random number generator.
Returns:

RNG keys for sampling initial position from prior. rng_keys_mcmc (Device Array): RNG keys for the local sampler. rng_keys_nf (Device Array): RNG keys for the normalizing flow global sampler. init_rng_keys_nf (Device Array): RNG keys for initializing wieght of the normalizing flow model.
Return type:

rng_keys_init (Device Array)
